extendedInfo.description: Tweetings is a powerful Twitter Client for Android devices. - Large screen support with panes- Push notifications over 3G or WiFi for mentions, dms, when you get a new follower, when you are retweeted, etc. You don't even need the app open!- Supports posting to TwitLonger and inline expansion- Uploading pic.twitter.com images as well as Img.ly, TwitPic and yFrog- Can be configured to automatically resend failed tweets- TweetMarker & Tweetings Cloud Timeline Sync support- Stream Tweets over WiFi... let the tweets flow, no need to refresh your main timelines again- Manage multiple accounts- Split long tweets into multiple shorter tweets- Inline image previews- Light and dark theme, even automatically switch based on the time of day!- Navigate timeline using volume keys (optional)- User photo timelines- Choose standard or light fonts (JellyBean and higher)- Schedule tweets: write a tweet, set a time and a date and then just wait. Configure for your deivce to send them on your behalf or remotely where your device doesn't even need to be turned on!- Saved Searches- View tweeting user's nearby on a map- Local Trends- Translate tweets- Shorten links with a variety of providers, including bit.ly, twtn.gs and goo.gl- List support- Mute twitter users, words or applications- View conversations inline- Delete your own tweets- Change timeline text size- Enable or disable retweets on a user by user basis- Pull to refresh- Optional tappable timeline links- Compose username & hashtag autocomplete- Add tweets to Buffer (see http://bufferapp.com)- Post or share conversation threads using Storify- Automatic timeline gap detection, and if that fails manually add gaps yourself- Load gaps in the timeline above or below the gap position- Timeline widget- Multi-window support for compatible devices (such as Galaxy Note 2)- Photo editing available as a free downloadable extension- Integration as a DashClock extensionTweetings is open source, more information here http://tweetings.net/android/source/

reviews.comment: If you\'re having image-issues, it\'s more than likely the SEA. However, within Tweetings when I click any one of the pics within a user\'s recent pictures, that causes the app to crash (half the time). Overall, it\'s still the best twitter app, seriously!
reviews.author: Jason Matthew P

reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic app
reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant app.   I\'d love for an option to take me directly to Readability in the integrated browser. Right now, I\'m having to select it after option original view then it reloads again. Also having \'Read Later\' option there would be terrific!   Hoping you can add that in next feature. Thank you
reviews.author: Ashwin Venkat

reviews.title: Very Near Perfect
reviews.comment: You won\'t find a better Twitter app. Very customizable and runs smooth.
reviews.author: Steve James

reviews.title: My Favorite Android Twitter App
reviews.comment: Has every feature I could ask for, settings to tweak things to a finite detail, a beautiful Holo theme, and is even open source! Love the frequent updates. I couldn\'t ask for more.
reviews.author: Leo Herzog

reviews.title: Great app, just one thing
reviews.comment: For larger devices, it is hard to reach the navigation tabs. It would be great to move them down to the bottom of the screen for easy access. Otherwise, GREAT app!
reviews.author: Nicolas Corder

reviews.title: It\'s okay...
reviews.comment: I really loved this app when you could see replies to a tweet, but now the feature is gone with no way to view replies. Falcon Pro and Tweetcaster still have this feature. The dev says it\'s no longer an API function, but other apps can do it?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Great on so many levels but... refreshing causes jump to top of TL. Odd and irritating. Effectively, you lose the entire refresh. Currently relying on (free) Tweedle, which doesn\'t do this. Shame.
reviews.author: Gary Kaill

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this app for my android phone! It\'s tons better than the original android app! Thanks!
reviews.author: Darren Cates

reviews.title: Didn\'t have any problems until.
reviews.comment: Every time I click on a profile picture it says invalid. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the money.
reviews.comment: Smoothest scrolling. Nice font. Many options.
reviews.author: Nick Naim

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: By a mile. Awesome work by the developers.
reviews.author: Dean F-P

reviews.title: User Timeline tab not working
reviews.comment: Reply to developers: it is not the limit issue because it is working in browser, and problem is here for days (until reinstall)    When user timeline tab added, it doesnt work.  It just keeps loading forever. Played with settings for hours, Tried rebooting, reinstalling and no solution. I thought this is an awesome app, but this is really basic feature. Also, sometimes my saved searches dissappear from search tab, and cannot get them back until reinstall. Fix both errors and 5 star rating will be back :(
reviews.author: Darko Jefti\304\207

reviews.title: Minor glitches
reviews.comment: App would be flawless if it wouldn\'t tell me error: invalid image every time I try to look at someone\'s AVI
reviews.author: Allen Epps

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: When I open a tweet the app doesn\'t show the replies to that tweet. Is it supposed to be like that or am I missing something ?
reviews.author: George Novac

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: But position in timeline tends to  jump every so often.
reviews.author: Juan Alberti

reviews.title: User tracking isn\'t there..
reviews.comment: The app is great and all, but user tracking hasn\'t worked for me since it was introduced. I\'ve used it on two devices, and I was never notified when someone tweeted. PLEASE FIX THIS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Double notifications
reviews.comment: First of all - settings for notifications are too confusing. Second - i get double notifications for mentions, dms.  Can you please fix this bug? Please? It\'s too annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updating all the time :)
reviews.comment: Almost everyday there\'s an update to this. Very nice app with split screen view for larger screens. Features are all there. Sometimes I feel that the timeline is not updating automatically. And timeline scrolling also stutters a bit. But I\'m sure devs are already working on it. Overall an awesome app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good twitter app
reviews.comment: the in line photo and twitlonger extended in line are great... it would be greatest if u could add more in line photo app ex. imagur and extended the twitshort in line
reviews.author: Ae MIN-G

reviews.title: Woo update
reviews.comment: Well, now that my tweeting problem seems to have beem fixed, I thought I\'d come back and update my review. Now my only problem is trying to figure out how to get my accounts to stop tweeting all at once--yes, even in \"single account mode.\" Update: Account problem fixed. Woot! Anyone know how to get the autorefresh to work now? I keep having to do it manually no matter what settings I check.
reviews.author: Tabitha ofTheBananasAwesome
